item.title: How do I add ice barrage?
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Hi, I need the code for ice barrage because right now it’s not working…It’s more like a multi attack that hits people…Any one got the code? My closest one is this:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { startAnimation(1979); calculateMagicHit(30); hitDiff = MageDamage; inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stayStill(); if(hitDiff >= 0 && hitDiff <= 200) { stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); } else { stillgfx(85, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); } } } if(playerBonus[3] <= 20) { castOnPlayer.playerGfx(85,10); }

And it doesn’t even work, I get 8 errors when I add… Give me a new one please

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add ice barrage?
